name: Lanadgel
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Your hero's name is Mirvan, he saved the world from evil enemies, until they placed him in a strange universe so that he could not save the world! You need to urgently get out of this strange universe after passing all the levels, so that this story does not end and the world was saved from evil enemies!

Lanadgel - This is a platformer with a very fun gameplay and many obstacles.

In the game you need to be afraid of prickly spikes and combustible lava, if you touch them, then you die and the level will start anew, there is also a common time scale at the end of it throws you to the beginning of the level.

During the game, your screen will be rotated 90 degrees, which will complicate your passing level.

Each subsequent level will be more and more difficult, but you have to go through this strange universe and save the whole world!
